translation.en: Yeah?
Yeah.
On my way.
Seriously?
It's a holiday.
Bad guys don't take a holiday.
Go back to sleep.
I was hoping we could talk.
Yeah, I gotta go.
So you're still upset?
I'm not upset. I'm just late.

translation.en: Call you later?
♪ Well, I'm a man, yes I am♪ ♪ And I can't help But love you so♪
ELLEN: The Monfell Shipping Center
translation.zh: （西太平洋战术训练机构） 墨菲集运中心在过去六个月间一直处于关闭状态

translation.en: has been non-operational for the last six months.
translation.zh: 墨菲集运中心在过去六个月间一直处于关闭状态

translation.en: Since its closure, it's become a favorite location
translation.zh: 自此之后，圣保罗会就喜欢在那里

translation.en: for Sao Paulo Locos to conduct business.
translation.zh: 自此之后，圣保罗会就喜欢在那里 做他们的生意

translation.en: They've come and gone as they please with minimal resistance.
translation.zh: 他们几乎是毫无障碍地通行其间

translation.en: That ends today.
Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.zh: 昨晚有一个集装箱从波哥大运抵墨菲

translation.en: Due to the amount of chatter, DEA believes
this could be their largest shipment of contraband to date.
translation.zh: 缉毒局认为这是迄今为止他们走私的最大一批违禁品

translation.en: The source couldn't identify exactly what was coming in.
translation.zh: 情报无法确认里面装的是什么

translation.en: So whether it's money, arms, or the ghost of Pablo Escobar, be ready.
translation.zh: 所以无论是钱，军火或是埃斯科瓦尔的鬼魂，都做好准备

translation.en: Secure the scene, help find the container.
Once you've done that, you all can go enjoy your holiday.
translation.zh: 做完之后，大家都可以回家过节了

translation.en: TRAVIS: We're just barbecuing.
It's a whole thing.
How about you? SOPHIA: I don't have any plans.
You should come over. Yeah?
Yeah. Carley and Becky would love to see you.
translation.zh: 对，卡莉和贝卡见到你会很高兴的

translation.en: Not me. I'm sick to death of you.
translation.zh: 我可不，我看你都看厌了

translation.en: Sorry to ruin your holiday.
You ruin every day, El. Why should today be an exception?
translation.zh: 你每天都很扫兴，艾尔今天为什么会是例外？

translation.en: Don't call me "El."
When did this come down?
translation.zh: 这消息是什么时候来的？

translation.en: Got a call from DEA at 2. Why?

translation.en: TRAVIS: A little short notice. ELLEN: We've had shorter.
translation.zh: -有点匆忙-以前还有更匆忙的

translation.en: Yeah.
Don't get that big brain of yours thinking, Travis. It only gets you in trouble.
translation.zh: 别用你的大脑袋来思考这只会让你惹上麻烦

translation.en: Inspiring as always. ELLEN: And don't fuck up.
translation.zh: -这话真是太鼓励人了-还有别搞砸了

translation.en: Let's go.
Ward? Hello?
WARD: What's this? PHOENIX: What we're looking for.
Yeah, it's pretty. BENSON: Hey, Chu.
Why don't you come down to the beach later?

translation.en: I'm having a party. No, I got plans.

translation.en: BENSON: It's your loss. PHIL: Benson.
Why would she go to your party? Aren't you too old for this?
translation.zh: -她为什么要去你的派对？-你年纪这么大了不能省省吗？

translation.en: Just entering my prime. [LAUGHTER]
Yo, I'm not doing anything. How come I didn't get an invite?
translation.zh: 我又没对你怎么样，你怎么不邀请我？

translation.en: Remember what happened last time you came?
translation.zh: 记得你上次来时发生了什么吗？

translation.en: No. Ask his wife.
All right, simmer down. Simmer down.
translation.zh: 好了，都冷静点 冷静点

translation.en: A little calm-before-the-storm levity.
translation.zh: 风暴来临前大家都冷静一点

translation.en: There's not gonna be a storm.
What makes you say that? They've been getting lazy.
translation.zh: -你为什么这么说？-他们最近懈怠了

translation.en: We've been letting them do a few scores, and now they feel safe.
translation.zh: 我们放任他们做了几笔生意现在他们感觉很安全

translation.en: Well, I guess we got all dolled up for nothing.
translation.zh: 看来我们是白穿这么多装备了

translation.en: TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: I don't give a damn what the DEA says.
translation.zh: 我不在乎缉毒局说什么

translation.en: We go in heavy, stay frosty.
Watch each other's backs
stick to the plan, stay tight.

translation.en: Let's do this.
CHU: Drop the phone and keep your hands where I can see them.
That was sloppy, Chu.
WARD: All, we have guard one on lockdown. Surveillance is ours.

translation.en: TRAVIS [OVER COMM]: Copy.
WARD: The yard's clear.
We got another guard on the east-side stairwell.

translation.en: [GUNS COCKING] CHU: Hands! Now.
MAN: Clear.
Knees.
How many others are there?
Sophie, anything?
Nothing. This was supposed to be a shipping yard.
translation.zh: 没有，这里应该是个存货的院子

translation.en: I don't see any containers. TRAVIS: Copy that.

translation.en: Come on, do you have to do that?
Sorry.
You sure this is the right place?
This is the place.
Let's go.
Jackpot. Copy. Where are you?
Outside. Northwest side of the warehouse.
Copy. Ward, stay where you are.
Everyone else, meet at the shipping container.
translation.zh: 其他人在集装箱处汇合

translation.en: Copy that.
Look to your left.
Copy. Straight ahead, guys.
I've got 10 to 12 hostiles coming in hot from inside the warehouse.
translation.zh: 仓库中有10到12名敌人正赶来

translation.en: [GUNFIRE] WARD: Take cover! Take cover!
SOPHIA: Take cover!
Cover me.
You okay? I'm all right.
I got you covered. Go.
PHIL: Gotta get her out!
Stay down. You're gonna be okay.
Are you hit?
Just got the vest.
Cover. Go, go, go.
Now you're both being sloppy.
You owe me a beer.
MAN: Let go! Let go! Little help here.
My arm!
My arm! Yard's secure.
My arm!
What the fuck?
It's a fucking suicide vest.
What are you wearing this for? Go fuck yourself.
Inside's secure.
What the fuck?
PHOENIX [ON COMM]: We need an ambulance!
TRAVIS [ON COMM]: I'm on it.
Fuck. Phil.
Phil!
I got Phoenix. Let me see if it went through your vest.
translation.zh: 我看看菲尼克斯我检查一下是否穿透了你的背心

translation.en: I got you.
"It's not gonna be a storm."
Cover!
Cut him down.
TRAVIS: I don't know why some crazy motherfucker
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么这个疯子

translation.en: would put on a suicide vest.
That's not our problem anymore.
translation.zh: 但这不是我们的问题了

translation.en: All right, fine.
Let go! Let go! My arm! SOPHIA: That's Diego.
translation.zh: -放开我，我的手臂-那是蒂亚戈

translation.en: He won't shut up, and the guy we cut down's not talking.
translation.zh: 他不肯闭嘴而我们放下来的那个人不肯说话

translation.en: What'd Dwyer say?
She's sending a wagon.
What? Why?
translation.zh: 什么？ -为什么？-她要我们带他们回去

translation.en: She wants us to bring 'em in.
translation.zh: -为什么？-她要我们带他们回去

translation.en: I thought this was DEA. The DEA guys are dead.
translation.zh: -我以为这是缉毒局的案子-缉毒局的人死了

translation.en: She can't get a hold of brass.
Fucking Fourth. Until she does, we hang onto 'em.

translation.en: We should keep 'em. Fuck the DEA.

translation.en: Fuck them all. These assholes killed Phil.

translation.en: They should defer to us. We're bringing 'em in.

translation.en: SOPHIA: What a mess.
LARS: Most people are under the impression
that since the Southern states were in favor of slavery,
translation.zh: 因为南部各州支持奴隶制

translation.en: that they insisted on the Three-Fifths Compromise
translation.zh: 所以他们坚持在宪法第一条第二款中

translation.en: found in Article 1, Section 2 of the Constitution
translation.zh: 加入了五分之三妥协条款

translation.en: that determined that slaves are only worth three-fifths a person.
translation.zh: 规定奴隶只算是五分之三的人

translation.en: It was, in fact, the North that did this.
translation.zh: 其实，这是北部各州加入的

translation.en: The South would have loved to have counted each slave twice,
translation.zh: 如果能把一个奴隶当两个算那南部可要高兴坏了

translation.en: and the North, rightly so,
didn't believe that the slaves that didn't have the right to vote
translation.zh: 不相信那些没有权力投票的奴隶

translation.en: should count equally to those that did.
translation.zh: 应该同那些有权投票的人平等对待

translation.en: That would've given the South more power
translation.zh: 这样南部就会拥有更多的权力

translation.en: to put their influence on the North.
translation.zh: 对北部的影响也就更大

translation.en: And what's your point?
I thought we were chatting.
[PHONE BEEPS ON] Yes?
MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: You've come an awful long way for nothing.

Just listen.
Diego fucked up.
He lost Scorpion.
And you have him?
MAN [ON SPEAKER]: Not that simple.
But I know where he is and how to get him.

translation.en: Fifty million.
We both know he's worth 10 times that.

translation.en: I don't think this is a game you wanna play.

translation.en: You don't know who you're dealing...
translation.zh: -你不知道你在和谁…-我以后再告诉你具体操作

translation.en: I'll be in touch with instructions.
translation.zh: -你不知道你在和谁…-我以后再告诉你具体操作 （通话结束）

translation.en: ...with.
Two hundred years ago, it was so much easier to buy a human being.

translation.en: Check out his story. If it's true?
translation.zh: -查查看他的说法-看看是不是真的？

translation.en: It's a fucking Scorpion.
I don't wanna lose him.
Not now. Not again.

We're short-handed. Help Sophie process our guests.

My arm! It's fucking broken. I'll break your other one. Move it.

translation.en: Move.
I thought I made myself clear.
translation.zh: 我以为我说得很清楚了

translation.en: We got jumped, and not by some--

translation.en: You say that, and all I hear is you weren't prepared.

translation.en: What happened? Your team take it easy because it's a holiday?

translation.en: What was the DEA onto? What do you mean?

translation.en: Come on, Ellen. This is so fucked.
translation.zh: -这是什么意思？-拜托，艾伦，这也太乱了

translation.en: Clearly, they weren't honest with us. All we know is what they told us.
translation.zh: -他们显然没和我们说实话-我们只知道他们告诉我们

translation.en: They acted on a tip that 500 million in product was moving through Monfell.
translation.zh: 他们收到线报有一笔价值五千万的货物要被送往墨菲

translation.en: And what's it turn out to be?
A guy in a box.
Protected by heavily armed Sao Paulo Locos soldiers--

translation.en: Their tip was wrong. What do you want me to say?

translation.en: That doesn't make them fucking liars.
translation.zh: 这并不意味着他们是骗子

translation.en: So what do we do now?
I have calls in. No one's around.
translation.zh: 我已经打电话了，现在还没有联系上

translation.en: Until we get answers, we sit tight.
translation.zh: 在我们得到答案之前我们先不要轻举妄动

translation.en: Fuck that. I'm gonna talk to them. No, you're not.
translation.zh: -不管了，我要和他们谈谈-不行

translation.en: You're gonna leave them be.
They're the feds' problem. Jesus Christ.

translation.en: Phil is dead. Don't you wanna know why?
translation.zh: 菲尔死了，你不想知道为什么吗？

translation.en: Right now all I'm thinking about is what I'm gonna tell his family.

translation.en: Elevator to lobby. Fine.
Lobby, please.
[DOOR BUZZES] Watch those sudden stops, boy!
Somebody could get hurt.
It's a big place.
And they've got their Christmas decorations up already.
translation.zh: 而且他们已经开始做圣诞节的装饰了

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas.
Uh, Mr. C, I wasn't...
Make yourselves at home.
Welcome.
Confound it, somebody better nail that down.
translation.zh: 找到它了，最好有人来收拾一下

translation.en: Could take a nasty fall from a loose board.

translation.en: Oh, I just...
Lord help the whole thing.
Nicholas. Did you do what I asked?
translation.zh: 尼古拉斯，你照我说的做了吗？

translation.en: Yes, yes. Yes.
I did. Let me just show you.
So I was able to tap into a security camera across from the shipping center.

translation.en: Where did they take him?
S.W.A.T.'s got him back at their place.
translation.zh: 特警组把他带回他们那里了

translation.en: It's their renovated facility in the middle of nowhere.

translation.en: Sounds like the paint isn't even dry yet. How do you know?

translation.en: I heard it on my police scanner.

translation.en: LARS: Well done, Nicholas.
Now...
Can you trace the number that called this phone?

translation.en: Find out who and where they are?
translation.zh: 查出他们的身份和位置？

translation.en: I can try. Try hard.
Of course. No problem.
ELLEN: Melissa, Phil pulled Phoenix out of harm's way just before he got shot.
translation.zh: 梅丽莎，菲尔救了菲尼克斯之后他才中弹的

translation.en: He was a hero.
Yes.
You have my word.
Whoever's responsible for this is gonna pay.
translation.zh: 害死他的人会付出代价

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: I'm sorry, I can't leave now.
No, I understand. Should I cancel today?
translation.zh: 不，我理解，我要取消今天的活动吗？

translation.en: No, don't do that.
You okay? Yeah. Yeah.
Travis?
Yeah?
I'm really sorry.
I love you.
It's our turn in the neighborhood
translation.zh: 轮到我们来举办节日烧烤会

translation.en: to host the holiday barbecue,
translation.zh: 轮到我们来举办节日烧烤会 所以卡莉在家为22个孩子和他们的父母做饭

translation.en: so Carley's at home making the food for 22 kids and their parents.
translation.zh: 所以卡莉在家为22个孩子和他们的父母做饭

translation.en: What's up? Elson called. Said to come down.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-埃尔森打电话来，让我们下去

translation.en: SOPHIA: Carley still mad at you?
She's not mad at me.
Sorry, man, I'm on her side.
What--? There's no side. She's not mad at me.
translation.zh: 什么？没有什么支持不支持的她没有生我的气

translation.en: Besides, you can't be on her side. You're my partner.
translation.zh: 再说了，你不能支持她你是我的搭档

translation.en: That's a brotherhood.
Yeah, but Carley's like my sister.
translation.zh: 对，但卡莉就好像我妹妹

translation.en: Sisterhood trumps brotherhood-- That's bullshit.
translation.zh: -姐妹情谊要胜过兄弟情义-胡说八道

translation.en: Look,
you decided before you got married that you only wanted one kid, right?
translation.zh: 你们结婚之前决定只要一个孩子

translation.en: Yeah. That was like 10 years ago.
But out of the blue, you say you want another kid.
translation.zh: 然后突然之间你又想要个孩子了

translation.en: Yeah, I said maybe we could think about having another kid,
translation.zh: 对，我说我们也许可以再生个孩子

translation.en: then it became-- You wanna know what she heard?
translation.zh: -然后就成了…-你想知道她是怎么想的吗？

translation.en: You wanna have another baby that she'll have to carry for nine months.
translation.zh: 你想再生一个孩子而她必须怀孕九个月

translation.en: She's gonna have to walk away from work after all she's accomplished.
translation.zh: 她必须辞掉自己的工作抛弃自己的成就

translation.en: She's gonna wake up 10 times a night to feed and change the kid
translation.zh: 她必须每天晚上起来十次给孩子喂奶换尿布

translation.en: because you're always off doing this.
translation.zh: 因为你总是不在家，在做这种事

translation.en: She heard all that with "maybe"? Yes.
translation.zh: -光是一个“也许”她就想这么多了？-是

translation.en: ELSON: I don't know. No, no, no, dude.
translation.zh: 我不知道 不，错误提示总是跳出来

translation.en: It just keeps coming up with an error.
translation.zh: 不，错误提示总是跳出来

translation.en: I don't know. It's some sort of remote-access bug.
translation.zh: 我不知道，这是某种远程登录的错误

translation.en: Have you ever seen it?
Yeah, I tried that. I tried that.
Oh, are you kidding me?
Yes, I had that in the queue. While we're young.
translation.zh: -我试过好几次了-没事你慢慢来

translation.en: I gotta go.
Please don't touch that.
What do you got?
Our friend Diego is a bad, bad dude.
translation.zh: 我们的朋友蒂亚戈是个很坏很坏的人

translation.en: From Honduras, okay?
Joined the Sao Paulo Locos, known as the S.P.L., when he was 6.
translation.zh: 他六岁的时候就加入圣保罗会了

translation.en: He's now a friggin' lieutenant.
translation.zh: 他现在已经是个副官了

translation.en: Okay. What about our mystery man?
Scorpion? Is that what we're calling him?
translation.zh: -那我们的神秘人呢？-蝎子？ 我们现在要这么叫他吗？

translation.en: Yeah, for now.
Nada on him. He's not in any active database.
translation.zh: 一点他的消息都查不到任何活跃的数据库里都没有他的信息

translation.en: What about other databases?
Such as? FBI? CIA? DoD?
translation.zh: -比如？-联邦调查局？中情局？国防部？

translation.en: I don't have clearance to tap those.
translation.zh: 我没有查这些数据库的权限

translation.en: But you could probably do it without clearance, right?
translation.zh: 但没有权限你大概也可以查，对吧？

translation.en: Are you asking me or telling me?
There's no way a guy protected by S.P.L.'s best is a ghost.
translation.zh: 不可能圣保罗会最优秀的人保护的是一个鬼魂

translation.en: Just find out who he is.
You got it, boss.
Hey, put Diego in room one.
Get him to talk, have Ward listen in. What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: -让他开口，让沃德旁听-你准备怎么办？

translation.en: I'm gonna go talk to...Scorpion.
Dwyer's gonna lose her shit.
Let me worry about Dwyer.
Hey, Diego. We meet again.
You broke my fucking arm.
I gave you the choice to have your arm broken or not.
translation.zh: 我让你选择要不要手臂骨折

translation.en: You chose poorly.
Now, explain something to me.
Why would a lieutenant be put on babysitting duty?
translation.zh: 为什么副官被派去当保姆了？

translation.en: Did they demote you, Diego?
translation.zh: 他们降你的级了吗，蒂亚戈？

translation.en: Go fuck yourself, puta.
Who's the man in the box? You wanna know who he is?
translation.zh: -集装箱里的男人是谁？-你想知道他是谁？

translation.en: That's who he is. He's the fucking devil!
translation.zh: 这就是他的身份，他是个恶魔！

translation.en: Want something to drink?
You need a medic? It's a holiday, but I could have it arranged.
translation.zh: 你需要个医生，今天是节日但我也可以给你安排

translation.en: Am I being charged with a crime?
That depends.
On...? Who are you?
Have you asked Diego who I am?
translation.zh: 你问过蒂亚戈我是谁了吗？

translation.en: What's that?
He said that this was going to happen.
translation.zh: 他说过这样的事情会发生

translation.en: He said they'd come and he'd escape.
translation.zh: -谁说…？-他说过他们会来，他会跑掉

translation.en: Who would escape? Diego--
You're all fucking dead. You don't know it.
translation.zh: 你们都要死掉了，你不知道而已

translation.en: You tell them I did this, okay?
translation.zh: 你告诉他们是我自己干的，好吗？

translation.en: You tell them I did this.
translation.zh: 你告诉他们我自己干的

translation.en: Hey, stop.
Diego, stop! Help!
I need some help in here!
Perhaps you should attend to that.
SOPHIA: Stop it.
Oh, God.
What the fuck happened?
He just impaled himself.
TRAVIS: You're kidding me.
Fuck me.
Who the fuck are you?
You have blood on your hands.
Answer the question.
Did you kill him?
No.
He killed himself.
Cracked his skull wide open.
We do not have much time.
I'm not asking again.
What is important is that you listen.
You may think the events of today were in error,
translation.zh: 你也许觉得今天发生的事情都乱了套

translation.en: but I assure you, my friend, they were not.
translation.zh: 但我可以向你保证，朋友，并没有

translation.en: You better start answering my questions.
translation.zh: 你最好开始回答我的问题

translation.en: I have information in my head worth billions of dollars.
translation.zh: 我脑袋里的信息价值上亿美金

translation.en: What kind of information?
The kind that can set the world on fire.
translation.zh: 可以让整个世界战火肆虐的信息

translation.en: Jesus Christ, enough with the fucking riddles.
Fine. Here is the truth.
Very soon, you will be told that officers
translation.zh: 很快，你就会得知联邦调查局的官员们来了

translation.en: from a federal agency are here to take me into custody.
translation.zh: 很快，你就会得知联邦调查局的官员们来了 要将我带走拘禁

translation.en: They are not what they say they are.
Do not let these men take me.
Do this, and I will help you to survive what is coming next.
translation.zh: 这样的话，我会帮你在接下来的事件中存活

translation.en: FBI's here for him now. What?
translation.zh: -联邦调查局的人来带走他了-什么？

translation.en: I told you I had calls in.
We're handing him over, so we can all go home.
translation.zh: 我们要把他上交，然后我们都能回家

translation.en: Did they say who he was? A known terrorist.
translation.zh: -他们告诉你他的身份了吗？-一个恐怖分子

translation.en: Someone they've been after for a while.
Where are they? Lobby.
I'll take care of it.
I'll bring them to him, pass him off.
translation.zh: 我带他们去接他，然后把他交接了

translation.en: Gentlemen, you're here for the prisoner.
translation.zh: 先生们，你们来接囚犯了

translation.en: Commander Hall. I'm Agent Franklin. My partner, Agent Cox.
translation.zh: 哈尔指挥官，我是富兰克林探员这是我的搭档考克斯探员

translation.en: Sorry for the delay. No problem.
We appreciate you hanging on to our guy.
translation.zh: 我很感谢你把我们的人带回来了

translation.en: Right this way.
That's funny, I thought all you FBI guys used Berettas.
translation.zh: 有意思，我以为联邦调查局的人都是用伯莱塔的

translation.en: These are our personal weapons.
translation.zh: 这些是我们的个人武器

translation.en: On the job? It's a holiday.
So what'd this guy do to get on your database, anyway?
translation.zh: 所以这家伙做了什么被记录到你们的数据库里了？

translation.en: Terrorist stuff. Things we're not to discuss.
translation.zh: -恐怖主义的事情-我们不方便透露

translation.en: "Terrorist stuff." What's his name?
Heh. Come on. His name can't be a matter of national security.
translation.zh: 不是吧，他的名字不至于会危及国家安全

translation.en: Well, look, it's clear you guys aren't FBI, so no fooling.
translation.zh: 显然你俩不是联邦调查局的人所以不用再骗我了

translation.en: Who are you?
Just hand the prisoner over.
Not until I get some answers.
You are dead, motherfucker.
Drop the knife now! Now! Oh, fuck.
CHU: Hands on your head.
Knees.
You all right, Commander? Prick.
Got him? Yeah, we got him.
translation.zh: -控制住了？-对，我们控制住他了

translation.en: Commander? Commander!
You trust me now?
CHU: Hooks.
Hands on your head.
Let's go.
You all right, Commander? Yeah, yeah.
WARD: Keep moving.
Keys, cowboy.
I'm going to enjoy watching you die.
translation.zh: 我会享受看着你们去死的

translation.en: Shut the fuck up.
Everything happened the way he said it would.
translation.zh: 一切正如他所说的一样发生

translation.en: Our mystery man's not even in the FBI's database.
translation.zh: 我们的神秘人都不在联邦调查局的数据库里

translation.en: Wait. How do you know that?
translation.zh: 我们的神秘人都不在联邦调查局的数据库里 等等，你怎么知道的？

translation.en: You hacked the FBI database?
translation.zh: 你黑进了联邦调查局的数据库？

translation.en: Just a bit.
Look, on the way to the shipping center,
translation.zh: 你瞧，我们去货运中心的路上

translation.en: I made a crack to Agent Weir about this being the calm before the storm,
translation.zh: 我对魏尔探员开玩笑说这是风暴前的平静

translation.en: and he said there wasn't gonna be a storm.
I don't think they were expecting any resistance,
translation.zh: 我觉得他们没有想到会有反抗

translation.en: which is odd, don't you think? It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: -而这很奇怪，你不觉得吗？-这无所谓了

translation.en: There is a protocol we need to follow-- Oh, fuck the protocol, Ellen!
translation.zh: -我们必须遵守规章…-别管规章了，艾伦！

translation.en: This isn't the end of it.
We lost enough guys today. I don't wanna lose more.
translation.zh: 我们今天死的人已经够多了我不想再有人牺牲

translation.en: You're a cop, right? At least you were before you put the jacket on.
translation.zh: 你是个警察，对吧？至少在你升官之前是

translation.en: What does your gut tell you?
translation.zh: 你的直觉是怎么告诉你的？

translation.en: Let's see what he has to say.
translation.zh: 看看他还有什么要说的

translation.en: TRAVIS: You know this man?
He actually just tried to kill me to get to you.
translation.zh: 他刚刚试图杀了我来找你

translation.en: SCORPION: I've never seen him before, but I know more like him will be coming.
translation.zh: 我之前从没有见过他但我知道更多他这样的人会来

translation.en: Many more. Why won't you tell us your name?
translation.zh: -很多很多-你为什么不把你的名字告诉我们？

translation.en: That is for your protection.
The less you know... TRAVIS: Well...
The ink on your back's not Sao Paulo Locos,
translation.zh: 你背后的纹身不是圣保罗会的标识

translation.en: nor does it rep any of their rivals, so you're clearly not a part of that game.
translation.zh: 也不代表了他们的敌手所以你显然不是黑帮的人

translation.en: My guess is you're Special Ops.
translation.zh: 我猜你是特殊行动组的

translation.en: You've been tortured, from the looks of it, more than once.
translation.zh: 你被折磨过，而且看起来还被折磨了不止一次

translation.en: You could have easily escaped our compound,
translation.zh: 你可以轻易逃出我们的大楼但你选择不这样做

translation.en: but you chose not to. Why?
translation.zh: 你可以轻易逃出我们的大楼但你选择不这样做 为什么？

translation.en: You need our protection
because everyone and their mother's coming after you
translation.zh: 因为会有许多人来追杀你

translation.en: because what you know
could cause blowback.
translation.zh: 可能会造成可怕的后果

translation.en: It is far more complicated than that.
Fill me in here. What am I missing?
translation.zh: 那来补充一下，我漏掉了哪些？

translation.en: Because I believe you when you say more like him are coming.
translation.zh: 因为你说更多像他这样的人会来而我相信这句话

translation.en: But you're gonna have to square-up with me
if you want us to do more than just turn you over.
translation.zh: 这样我们才不会把你交出去

translation.en: You were correct about Special Ops,
translation.zh: 特殊行动组这一点你没说错

translation.en: but that was only in the beginning.
I quickly realized that information was true power.
translation.zh: 我很快意识到信息才是真正的力量

translation.en: So you're a spy. And I have the goods on everyone.
translation.zh: -所以你是个间谍-而我对每个人都有所了解

translation.en: What is it?
I traced the cell phone. LARS: Who is it?
I don't have a "who",
but I have where the call originated from.
translation.zh: 但我知道这通电话是从哪打出的

translation.en: Okay. So, what happened? How'd you end up in our cell?
translation.zh: 所以怎么回事？你怎么会落入我们的牢房之中？

translation.en: made a mistake in Bogotá.
So why'd they capture you? Why not kill you?
translation.zh: 所以他们为什么把你关起来了？为什么不杀了你？

translation.en: To facilitate my sale.
ELLEN: Bullshit. The S.P.L. knows their lane.
translation.zh: 胡说 圣保罗会知道自己是干什么的他们不会傻到做这种买卖

translation.en: They're not dumb enough to trade in that game.
translation.zh: 圣保罗会知道自己是干什么的他们不会傻到做这种买卖

translation.en: No, but others do.
Who, then? Unsure.
SCORPION: But one thing I am sure of:
Someone from your team is involved.
translation.zh: 你队伍里的某人也牵扯其中

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas, who are these people?
Show me who we're up against.
translation.zh: 让我看看我们的对手是什么样

translation.en: Where you going, Travis?
Commander? I'm moving him.
Where?
Not alone. The team should be in on this.
translation.zh: 你不能一个人去整支小队都应该加入

translation.en: No.
Just me. What, are you crazy?
That doesn't make any sense. Nothing about today makes sense.
translation.zh: -这完全说不通-今天的事情没一件说得通的

translation.en: If I tell you where I'm going,
translation.zh: 如果我告诉你我去哪里

translation.en: they could get it out of you. They wouldn't be able to.
translation.zh: -他们能从你这里套出这个信息-他们做不到的

translation.en: They're coming for him, Sof,
and they're not gonna stop.
I won't let another person I care about die today.
translation.zh: 今天我不会让我在乎的人再少一个的

translation.en: If they know he's here, they could be watching the compound, and--
translation.zh: 如果他们知道他在这里他们可能在监视这栋楼，而且…

translation.en: I'll have Elson review the area.
translation.zh: 我会让埃尔森检查附近区域

translation.en: Thanks.
I'm moving you.
Moving me will not keep them from coming for me.
translation.zh: 带我走不会阻止他们来找我

translation.en: No, but it'll keep them from my team,
translation.zh: 的确，但这能阻止他们来找我的小队

translation.en: and that's my priority.
It's how it's gotta be.
Yo, Commander, what's going on?
Hey. Just saw Hall taking Scorpion out.
translation.zh: 我刚看到哈尔带蝎子出去

translation.en: What do you mean, "out"?
It's him.
Hello? MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: Listen to me carefully.
You don't have much time.
How we looking?
Yeah, yeah. Everything looks good. No unusual activity.
translation.zh: 一切看起来都很正常没有反常的活动

translation.en: SOPHIA: "Remote access error." What is that?
ELSON: That? I don't know.
That has been bugging me all day.
translation.zh: 我今天都为此纠结一整天了

translation.en: MAN [ON COMM]: I'm in position.
Did you disable the camera that shows our sniper?
translation.zh: 你关闭了显示我方狙击手的摄像头了吗？

translation.en: What I did was record footage before he got there,
translation.zh: 我录下了他就位之前的画面

translation.en: and just have it playing back on a continuous loop.
A simple "yes" would suffice.
translation.zh: 回答简单的“是”就可以了

translation.en: Is he clear? Yes.
Yes.
Think they're watching? They are definitely watching.
translation.zh: -你觉得他们在看吗？-他们绝对在看

translation.en: Travis, stop!
What are you doing?
You said you didn't want anyone else to die.
translation.zh: 你说过你不想再死人了

translation.en: Yeah, and that included you.
I'll radio when I'm safe.
translation.zh: 等我安全了会无线电通报

translation.en: TRAVIS: Let's go.
I was personally put in charge of Glen Damone's protection. Know who that is?
translation.zh: 我亲自负责保护格伦·达蒙你知道那是谁吧？

translation.en: The mafia accountant.
Trial lasted five months, no less than 20 bounties on his head.
translation.zh: 审判持续了五个月他身上背了不下20个悬赏

translation.en: He never got one scratch under my watch.
translation.zh: 在我的看护之下，他一点事情都没有

translation.en: Wait. Wasn't he assassinated shortly after the trial?
translation.zh: 等等，审判结束后不久他不就被暗杀了吗？

translation.en: That was on Witness Protection, not me.
translation.zh: 那是证人保护干的事，不是我

translation.en: Watch your head.
When they clear the compound, take out the driver.
translation.zh: 等他们出了大楼，就干掉司机

translation.en: If anyone kills Scorpion, they die next. MAN [ON COMM]: Roger that.
MAN: They're leaving the facility. Take him out.
You'd be wise to take cover. What?
Duck!
Oh, shit. They're under attack.
We gotta go. WARD: Let's move!
Where are you going? To help.
You're not field. Help from here. Find out where the backup is!
translation.zh: -你不是外勤，在这里帮忙-去找援兵

translation.en: WOMAN: Dispatch. This is Seattle S.W.A.T.
translation.zh: -调度中心-这里是西雅图特警组

translation.en: We're under heavy attack and need immediate assistance.
translation.zh: 我们正受到猛烈袭击，需要立刻援助

translation.en: WOMAN: Roger that, Seattle S.W.A.T.
Hang tight.
Backup's on its way.
SCORPION: Commander?
Go! Go! Go!
I've got the shot.
Not on my shift, motherfucker.
translation.zh: 在我上班的时候可不行，混蛋

translation.en: Fuck!
Do not let him get away!
Commander, nice of you to join us.
translation.zh: 指挥官，你能加入真是太好了

translation.en: TRAVIS: Son of a bitch.
Back to the compound. Move it. Now!
Holy fuck.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
Clear. MAN 2: Clear! Go!
Get the truck out.
Everyone, inside! Gutierrez, I'm on the move!
translation.zh: -大家都进去-古蒂艾瑞兹 -我上了-快走

translation.en: Go, go!
Dwyer, shut us down!
I'm on it. Shut us down now!
What part of "we need him alive" do they not understand?
translation.zh: “他必须活着”这句话有多难理解？

translation.en: Are those shields?
Well, you have to admire their resilience.
translation.zh: 你必须钦佩他们的反抗精神

translation.en: Nicholas,
can you open them?
It's one thing to hack their comms and cameras,
translation.zh: 黑进通讯频道和摄像头是一码事

translation.en: but shields are controlled by the internal mainframe.
translation.zh: 但护盾是由主机控制的

translation.en: It'd need to be taken out before I can do anything.
translation.zh: 必须先把主机关了我这边才能做出改动

translation.en: LARS: Find a way past those shields.
translation.zh: 想个办法绕过那些护盾

translation.en: Leave the rest to me. In the meantime, kill the power.
translation.zh: 剩下的就交给我在此期间，切断他们的电源

translation.en: Kill everything.
Ready the next wave, and let's see how resilient they truly are.
translation.zh: 准备好下一波人看看他们到底有多能反抗

translation.en: Got that?
TRAVIS: Where's the backup, Elson?
What the fuck happened?
Hold up, hold up. What are you doing?
I assure you, Inspector, what's out there is far more dangerous to you than me.
translation.zh: 我向你保证，警督外面的人比我危险多了

translation.en: They're only dangerous to us because of you.
translation.zh: 他们之所以危险，就是因为你

translation.en: You brought this to our door, all of it, and I can end it right now.
translation.zh: 是你把这些人引上门的而我现在就能中止这一切

translation.en: And you think killing me will stop this war?
translation.zh: 你觉得杀了我可以中止这场战争？

translation.en: Ellen, this isn't who we are.
Now what? What's going on, Elson?
translation.zh: -现在怎么办？-怎么回事，埃尔森？

translation.en: ELSON: Yeah, they cut the comm and power, and judging by the signal on my cell,
translation.zh: 他们切断了通讯和电源而且从我的手机信号来看

translation.en: they're jamming the cell tower too.
Fuck. Any satellite phones on-site?
translation.zh: -他们还干扰了信号塔-操 我们这里有卫星电话吗？

translation.en: ELSON: Yeah, none that are working.
Why are cameras working but not Internet or phones?
translation.zh: （重定向视频源） 为什么监控摄像头还能用但网络和电话不行了？

translation.en: In cases like this, you wanna see.
translation.zh: 这种情况下，你会想要看到情况

translation.en: So we put security separate on the internal mainframe.
translation.zh: 所以我们把监控录像放在内部的主机上了

translation.en: And they would want to see as well.
translation.zh: 而且他们也会想看一看

translation.en: They hacked the security cameras.
They can do that? It's not that hard.
translation.zh: -他们可以这样做吗？-并没有那么难

translation.en: For somebody who's good enough, it's not.
translation.zh: 对足够好的人来说，的确不难

translation.en: TRAVIS: Cut the interior security cameras.
Don't let them see what we're doing.
translation.zh: -别让他们看到我们在做什么-收到

translation.en: ELSON: Copy that.
translation.zh: -别让他们看到我们在做什么-收到 （内部监控录像）

translation.en: SCORPION: You must get this through your skulls.
translation.zh: （没有信号） 你必须好好想想

translation.en: These are professional soldiers. They will isolate you, intimidate you
translation.zh: 这些都是职业士兵他们会隔离你，恐吓你

translation.en: until they find your weakest link and then exploit it.
translation.zh: 直到他们找到一个弱点来利用

translation.en: I thought you said the phones were out. They are.
translation.zh: -你不是说电话被切断了吗？-是的

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hello?
Commander Hall?
Yeah.
I'm the man in control of the small army sitting on your doorstep.
translation.zh: 你门口的那支小小军队是我指挥的

translation.en: Do you have a moment to chat?
If you want me on speaker, go ahead. I understand.
translation.zh: 你想按免提的话，请便，我理解

translation.en: Everyone should hear.
I should've done this earlier.
It would've saved us all a lot of time, sweat
translation.zh: 这样就能给我们节省很多时间，精力

translation.en: and blood.
I have your compound surrounded.
Your power, your network,
all of your communications are down.
translation.zh: 你们所有的通讯手段都被切断

translation.en: No one knows that you're in trouble, and no one's coming to help.
translation.zh: 没有人知道你们遇到了麻烦没有人会来帮忙

translation.en: Your officer spoke to my associate, Simone,
translation.zh: 接你上司电话的是我的搭档西蒙

translation.en: not the dispatch operator.
translation.zh: 而不是调度中心的接线员

translation.en: Hello.
The man you pulled out of a box belongs to me.
translation.zh: 你们从盒子里救出来的那个人属于我

translation.en: Hand him over
and I'll go away.
Just like that?
Just like that.
Can't do it.
Scorpion...
I know you're listening.
Tell these people who I am.
His name is Lars Cohagen.
He runs a private military corporation
translation.zh: 经营一家私人军事企业

translation.en: that specializes in dark ops. The kind that overthrow small countries?
translation.zh: -专门经营黑色行动-推翻小国家的那种行动？

translation.en: Some not so small. Hm.
Now that we're all in the know,
translation.zh: 现在我们都相互了解了

translation.en: why don't you come on out and spare the lives of these nice people?
translation.zh: 你不如就出来吧？让这些好人能够好好过日子

translation.en: Let them return home and enjoy what's left of the holiday.
They could still catch the fireworks.
How many times are we going to go through this?
This is it.
This is our last dance.
I've heard this before.
Commander Hall, the man you're protecting is a consummate liar.
translation.zh: 哈尔指挥官，你保护的这个人是个瞎话大王

translation.en: His skills of deception supersede even mine.
translation.zh: 他骗人的手段连我都比不上

translation.en: In fact, I will guarantee that he's lying to you right now.
translation.zh: 事实上，我敢保证他现在也在骗你

translation.en: Has he told you there's one in your organization that's against you?
translation.zh: 他是不是告诉过你你们内部有一个内奸？

translation.en: Or that he has information that could set the world ablaze?
translation.zh: 或者说他手中的信息能够让全世界战火肆虐？

translation.en: He's a liar
and a killer and nothing more.
All your problems go away if you just
turn him over.
translation.zh: 你们的问题全都会消失

translation.en: And I already told you,
I'm not doing that.
Commander, so this stranger's life
translation.zh: 指挥官… 所以这个陌生人的生命比你的小队更重要？

translation.en: is more important to you than your team's?
translation.zh: 所以这个陌生人的生命比你的小队更重要？

translation.en: What about Daniel Chu?
David Jefferson?
Luis and Maria Gutierrez?
translation.zh: 路易和玛利亚·古蒂艾瑞兹？

translation.en: Carley and Rebecca?
Is Scorpion's life worth more to you than their lives?
translation.zh: 蝎子的生命对你来说比他们的生命更重要吗？

translation.en: Are all their lives worth Scorpion's to you?
translation.zh: 他们所有人的生命对你来说还不如蝎子一个人吗？

translation.en: Enough. I'm coming out.
But before I do,
I want your guarantee.
No harm comes to anyone here, nor their families.
translation.zh: 你们不会伤害这里的任何一个人以及他们的家人

translation.en: You have my word.
I will be out in 10 minutes.
You'd better be.
ELSON: Commander, try the phone again. Maybe we have a live line out.
translation.zh: 指挥官，再试试看电话也许现在线路接通了

translation.en: TRAVIS: No...
Shit.
TRAVIS: You're not giving yourself up.
translation.zh: -你不能把自己交出去-我可没这么说

translation.en: I never said I was. I only said I was coming out.
translation.zh: -你不能把自己交出去-我可没这么说 我说我会出去

translation.en: You think you can take on this whole army alone? I work best alone.
translation.zh: -觉得你可以单枪匹马打赢他的军队？-我最擅长单枪匹马

translation.en: With the shields down, this place can withstand a riot.
translation.zh: 护盾放下之后这里可以承受住一场暴动

translation.en: You don't have to go.
WARD: Hold on a second. I'm confused.
You giving yourself up or not? He's not.
translation.zh: -你到底准不准备投降？-他不投降

translation.en: We can't let him. HOOKS: Yes, we can.
translation.zh: -我们不能让他去-我们可以的

translation.en: Did you not see that army out there?
translation.zh: 你没有看到外面的那支军队吗？

translation.en: We just lost Phil and Benson.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚失去了菲尔和本森

translation.en: I don't plan to join them because of this son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 我可不准备为了这个杂种也死掉

translation.en: You heard him, Commander.
He's threatening our families, and there's no backup.
translation.zh: 他威胁了我们的家人，而且没有援军

translation.en: This guy's a fucking liar. He could be playing us. Let him go.
translation.zh: 这个人是个骗子他可能在骗我们，放弃他吧

translation.en: No. We're not giving in to this Lars asshole.
translation.zh: 不，我们不能对这个拉斯混蛋投降

translation.en: Not after all that's happened.
translation.zh: 都已经发生了这么多了

translation.en: It ain't his fault a lunatic's shooting up the building.
translation.zh: 那个疯子攻击这栋楼，并不是他的错

translation.en: Maybe it is. We don't know.
Scorpion could've escaped or killed us several times.
translation.zh: 蝎子有好几次机会可以逃跑或是杀了我们

translation.en: He didn't. I believe him.
That just might mean that he needed our help to survive.
translation.zh: 这也许只意味着他需要我们的帮助才能活下去

translation.en: That doesn't disprove what Lars said.
translation.zh: 这并没有反驳拉斯刚刚说的话

translation.en: Believe Lars when he says he will stop at nothing
translation.zh: 拉斯说他不会停手他会想办法进来找到我

translation.en: to find a way inside to get me.
If I do not come out now, that army outside,
translation.zh: 如果我现在不出去，外面的军队

translation.en: those phony agents,
they are just the tip of the iceberg.
You're right.
We'll put you by the back door.
Only it won't be you.
translation.zh: 只不过出去的不会是你

translation.en: Heh. In theory, it should work. I loaded everything you'll need on the laptop.
translation.zh: 从理论上说，应该可以了我把你需要的都装在这笔记本里了

translation.en: You should be good to go.
I wanna thank you for your assistance today, Nicholas.
translation.zh: 我想要感谢你今天的帮助，尼古拉斯

translation.en: Oh, my pleasure, sir.
Did you know that Scorpion and I used to be partners?
translation.zh: 你知道蝎子和我曾经是搭档吗？

translation.en: Right. You were saying.
It was great for a while,
translation.zh: 有段时间合作得很愉快

translation.en: and then five years ago in Berlin, he betrayed me.
translation.zh: 然后五年前在柏林，他背叛了我

translation.en: After all we'd been through.
You know, and I knew it.
I knew something was wrong, but I didn't react in time.
translation.zh: 我知道有哪里不对劲但我没有及时作出反应

translation.en: Since then, I've taken greater precaution in my business dealings, because
translation.zh: 之后，我做生意的时候就小心多了，因为

translation.en: no matter how much you think you know someone,
translation.zh: 无论你以为你多了解那个人

translation.en: they could stab you in the back.
Do you understand what I'm saying?
Yeah, I think so.
Good.
WARD: All right, let me get this straight.
You wanna raise the door shields and let the army in?
translation.zh: 你想要打开护盾，让外面的军队进来？

translation.en: That's your plan? Not let them in. Lure them close, then ambush them.
translation.zh: 不是让他们进来是把他们引诱过来，然后埋伏他们

translation.en: Why won't that work?
Because it's batshit crazy.
TRAVIS: We're not turning this man over to mercenaries.
translation.zh: 我们不可能把这个人交给雇佣兵

translation.en: Once they're in the courtyard, we've got them trapped.
translation.zh: 等他们到院子里之后，他们就被困住了

translation.en: How do you figure that?
The back door is located in the deepest part of the courtyard.
Here.
Now, about three dozen office windows look down onto it.
translation.zh: 上面有差不多30多扇办公室的窗户

translation.en: That's where we'll be.
We'll make them think we're handing you over.
translation.zh: 我们让他们觉得我们是要把你交出去了

translation.en: To sell it, Elson will figure out a way to open the rear entrance shield.
translation.zh: 为了更可信一些，埃尔森会想办法打开后门的护盾

translation.en: Now, once they get eyes on the bait,
they're gonna move in underneath our hidden positions,
translation.zh: 他们会靠近，走入我们埋伏的位置

translation.en: and that's when we hit 'em.
They'll be sitting ducks.
It's the first time the shields have ever been activated.
translation.zh: 这是我们第一次启用护盾

translation.en: I've never done, nor am I even sure
that isolated openings will work as you describe them.
translation.zh: 更不要说我都不确定是否能像你描述的那样打开单独一扇护盾

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you'll figure it out.
They'll be expecting something like that.
translation.zh: 他们会料想到这种事情的

translation.en: TRAVIS: Well, this is our only option.
translation.zh: 对，但这是我们唯一的选择

translation.en: They got us boxed in.
We can't call out, and you said it yourself.
translation.zh: 我们没法求救，这是你自己说的

translation.en: It's only a matter of time till he finds his way in.
translation.zh: 他们找到进来的办法只是时间问题

translation.en: At least this way, it's on our own terms.
Look, guys, this isn't an order.
I'm not forcing you into this.
But I, for one, don't wanna sit around and let someone else determine my fate.
translation.zh: 但我可不想干坐在这里让别人来决定我的命运

translation.en: If I'm going out,
it's gonna be on my terms, not theirs.
translation.zh: 那必须是我愿意出去而不是被他们逼迫

translation.en: If this is what you want, I will need firepower.
translation.zh: 如果你想这样做，我需要武器

translation.en: TRAVIS: We've got every weapon known to man.
translation.zh: 市面上有的武器我们都有

translation.en: What exactly are you looking for?
I will know it when I see it. TRAVIS: We aim to please.
translation.zh: -等我看到了我就知道了-我们乐意帮忙

translation.en: TRAVIS: In the meantime, spread out and load up.
translation.zh: 在此同时，大家分散开来，拿好武器

translation.en: Just because I'm browsing don't mean I'm giving up on you.
translation.zh: 我看别的地方可不意味着我不会要你

translation.en: What the fuck do you do with that?
You don't want anything to do with that.
That's when you got nothing to live for.
HOOKS: Hey.
Oh, never mind.
What did you find?
Excellent. WARD: Why?
Our regular radios still work.
translation.zh: 我们普通的无线电还是有用的

translation.en: He may have tapped into those frequencies.
translation.zh: 他也许已经监听了那些频道

translation.en: He will not be able to do so with this model.
translation.zh: 用这个型号他就没法监听了

translation.en: Okay. Everyone grab one.
You gotta change.
TRAVIS: How'd you get the name Scorpion, anyway?
translation.zh: 你是怎么得到蝎子这个名号的？

translation.en: I assume that's not on your birth certificate.
translation.zh: 我猜你出生证明上写的不是这个

translation.en: SCORPION: You are assuming I have a birth certificate.
translation.zh: 你是在猜我有一张出生证明

translation.en: Heh. All right, you're not gonna tell me your name.
translation.zh: 你是在猜我有一张出生证明 好吧，你不会告诉我你的名字

translation.en: At least you can tell me how you know Lars Cohagen.
translation.zh: 至少你可以告诉我你是怎么认识拉斯·科哈根的

translation.en: We were once partners.
I never said I was a good man, Commander, just good at what I do.
translation.zh: 我从没说过我是个好人，指挥官只是擅长我所做的事情罢了

translation.en: You do not know me, Commander.
You should not be taking this risk.
Even holiday double-time ain't enough to deal with this shit today.
translation.zh: 我今天干的活节日双倍工资都不够付的

translation.en: You know, the job is risk.
translation.zh: 你知道，干这一行本身就有风险

translation.en: It's not about or for you.
translation.zh: 这同你无关，我也不是为了你

translation.en: Not any longer.
Our guys' blood's been spilled today.
Someone's gonna pay for that.
SCORPION: There is one thing you have not addressed.
translation.zh: 有一件事情你还没有处理

translation.en: The person on the inside who is working against us.
translation.zh: 你队伍中有一个人在拖我们后腿

translation.en: When they attacked the van, they were waiting for us.
translation.zh: 他们袭击货车的时候是埋伏着等我们

translation.en: Someone told Lars you were taking me from the compound.
translation.zh: 有人告诉拉斯，你要把我带离这栋楼

translation.en: ELLEN [ON COMM]: Two-minute warning.
Copy that. Everyone get in position.
We go on my call. Copy that.
Good luck.
Never really believed in luck.
Well, good luck anyway.
Everyone set? Know what they're doing?
translation.zh: 各就各位了吗？大家都知道要做什么吧？

translation.en: ALL: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的，长官 是的，长官

translation.en: Sof, you remember Suffolk, a few years back?
translation.zh: 索菲，你记得几年前萨福克的事情吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
That was another supposedly cakewalk mission
translation.zh: 那个任务本来也应该很简单

translation.en: that turned into a shitshow.
What was it, 40 gangbangers against eight S.W.A.T.?
translation.zh: 当时什么情况，40个帮派成员对抗八个特警？

translation.en: I tell people I never know how we survived that night.
translation.zh: 我告诉别人我都不知道我们是怎么在那晚上活下来的

translation.en: But I do know...
we're S.W.A.T.
We're the baddest motherfuckers on Earth.
translation.zh: 我们是世界上最厉害的人

translation.en: TRAVIS: Let's get in position.
Take care of each other.
The least he could've done was give us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.zh: 他至少可以把芯片交出来让我们保住性命

translation.en: There's no microchip. It's in his head.
translation.zh: 没有芯片，他都装在脑子里

translation.en: Hey, make sure we're in position before--
translation.zh: -确保我们都到位了，然后再…-喂

translation.en: Hey. It's not my first rodeo.
Don't fuck up.
How we looking?
When we get the go, I just hit enter, and it'll raise the rear-entrance shield.
translation.zh: 准备好了之后我按回车就能打开后门的护盾了

translation.en: But not the rest of the building? Right. Just the rear entrance.
translation.zh: -但其他的护盾不会打开？-对，只有后门的

translation.en: In theory.
In theory?
In theory.
MAN 1: Position! Hold that position!
MAN 2: All right, let's go.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
SIMONE: No sign of Scorpion.
Commander, is your team ready?
translation.zh: 指挥官，你的队伍准备好了吗？

translation.en: Let's go around the horn.
Hooks, set.
Jefferson, set. York, set.
Gutierrez, set. Chu, set.
Ward, are you in position?
Ward?
Sorry, I was using the wrong mic.
We're all set.
Raise the shield. Copy.
It worked.
SIMONE: Right on time.
They're opening the shields by the rear entrance. Move in.
translation.zh: 他们要打开后门的护盾了，上

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON COMM]: Here they come. Get ready.
SIMONE: Third-floor window.
What is that?
Morse code.
Pull everyone back. It's a trap.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Everyone move back. Now.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. He's stopping. Why is he stopping?
translation.zh: 他停下了，他为什么停下了？

translation.en: Hey!
TRAVIS: The fuck just happened?
Everybody fall back to the command center.
ELLEN [ON COMM]: Copy. Everyone fall back.
Fuck.
Elson, close the rear shields. I'm on it.
translation.zh: -埃尔森，关闭后门的护盾-我在关

translation.en: Where's everybody else? Ward, I don't know.
translation.zh: -人都去哪儿了？-沃德，我不知道

translation.en: Scorpion's M.I.A.
Dwyer left a few minutes ago. Where?
translation.zh: -德沃尔几分钟前走了-去哪儿了？

translation.en: We saw a light at the third-floor window
translation.zh: 我们看到三楼的窗户有灯光

translation.en: and she just bolted. A flash of light?
translation.zh: -她就跑出去了-灯光？哪扇窗户？

translation.en: Which window? Right there.
translation.zh: -她就跑出去了-灯光？哪扇窗户？ 就是那里

translation.en: Stay here. Keep an eye on everything outside.
translation.zh: 都留在这里，注意外面的动向

translation.en: Where are you going? Find the big guy.
Scorpion, come in.
Scorpion, do you copy?
Get up.
I'm gonna let you out of here.
You're gonna tell Lars I'm gonna find another way to give him Scorpion.
translation.zh: 你去告诉拉斯我会另想办法帮他弄到蝎子

translation.en: No one else needs to die.
Shit, it was you.
Yeah, I'll tell him. Lead the way.
WARD: The amount is the same upon delivery. Fifty million. That hasn't changed.
translation.zh: 送货上门之后还是五千万这一点没有变

translation.en: Fifty million's a sweet fucking payday for a cop.
translation.zh: 五千万对一个警察来说可是一笔不小的收入

translation.en: Those DEA assholes are always skimming off the top.
translation.zh: 那些缉毒局的混蛋总是捞油水

translation.en: About time I got some. Of course, it is.
Hey. This mess is Hall's fault. If he had handed over Scorpion--
translation.zh: -我也该捞一点了-当然了 这件事都是哈尔的错如果他交出蝎子的话…

translation.en: What the hell's the plan on getting me out of here?
translation.zh: 你不是说要放我出去吗？

translation.en: We're gonna cut the power to the mainframe.
translation.zh: 我们要去切断主机的电源

translation.en: Once the shields are up, Lars can take care of the rest.
translation.zh: 护盾打开之后拉斯可以搞定剩下的事情

translation.en: Where are the controls? Engineering room.
Thanks.
ELLEN: Ward?
Fuck.
TRAVIS: Ellen.
You all right? Yeah.
It was Ward.
I saw him talking to Franklin before Franklin killed him.
translation.zh: 我看到他和富兰克林说话然后富兰克林杀了他

translation.en: Where'd he go? In there.
Yeah? Ready?
See that?
CHU: What just happened? Security feed's been cut.
translation.zh: -发生什么了？-监控录像被切断了

translation.en: We're blind outside now, too. You said the feed was internal.
translation.zh: -我们现在连外面的情况也看不到了-你说过录像是内部控制的

translation.en: It is.
Without it, I've lost control of our security system. What does that mean?
translation.zh: -我们的安保系统也不受控制了-这是什么意思？

translation.en: What I mean is the same crazy fuck that's been attacking us can open our shields,
translation.zh: 也就是说袭击我们的那群疯子现在可以打开我们的护盾

translation.en: and there is nothing that we can do about it.
Closer.
Clear.
What the fuck is happening? The shields are raising.
YORK: Can you stop it? ELSON: No.
What do you think he's gonna fucking do, huh?
Oh, yeah.
ELLEN: Travis!
SIMONE: Intel from Berlin.
Dead or alive no longer matters.
I will go in there and fucking kill him myself if I have to!
translation.zh: 我要进去，亲手把他杀了

translation.en: Go!
Everyone, move in.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Shoot to kill Scorpion on sight.
MAN: Let's go! Let's go!
Oh, shit.
Everyone fall back. Let's go. Come on.
TRAVIS: Go, go, go, go, go, go!
Elson, come on.
MAN: After those guys! Let's go!
translation.zh: 去追那些人 咱们上

translation.en: TRAVIS: Clear!
Move, move, move, move!
YORK: Let's go! Let's go!
Man down!
HOOKS: Jefferson, come on!
Jefferson.
Go!
Later, bitches.
Get over yourself.
Let's go. Go.
Duck.
Oh, you meant that kind of firepower.
SCORPION: I have something to show you.
translation.zh: 我要带你去看一样东西

translation.en: The way out.
I found a maintenance tunnel.
translation.zh: 我找到了一条维护通道

translation.en: TRAVIS: Yeah, it's been sealed.
SCORPION: Not anymore.
Nope. Fuck that. Hey, it's either that,
or you go back out there to face a bunch of badass dudes shooting at you.
translation.zh: 要么回去面对一群想要开枪打死你的坏人

translation.en: All right, give me a boost. Okay.
ELSON: Fuck.
CHU: Right behind you, Elson. ELSON: Okay.
Travis. I'm going after Dwyer.
No way I'm leaving one of our own behind.
translation.zh: 我不可能把我们的人抛下

translation.en: Get 'em to safety, okay?
You don't know how many of them are still up there.
translation.zh: 你不知道外面还有多少人

translation.en: Or if she's even alive. I'm gonna be fine.
translation.zh: -也不知道她是否还活着-我没事的

translation.en: Go on. I'm not letting you go alone.
translation.zh: -去吧-我不会让你一个人去的

translation.en: He won't be.
I'll call for backup as soon as I can.
You don't have to do this. I know.
You didn't have to come back just for us.
translation.zh: 你回来并不仅仅是为了我们

translation.en: I didn't.
TRAVIS: Looks like everybody cleared out.
SCORPION: Unlikely.
Lars would never give up.
At least I got you.
Now let us see if you can finish the job.
translation.zh: 现在来看看你是否能搞定我

translation.en: Hey.
[SIGHS] Hey.
What happened? It's over.
Good guys won. Come on.
TRAVIS: We lost York and Jefferson.
ELLEN: Oh, God, no. TRAVIS: Yeah.
ELLEN: What about Scorpion? TRAVIS: Yeah, he's still alive...
somehow.
Still no signal? TRAVIS: No.
Gutierrez said she'd call it in when they got out.
translation.zh: 古蒂艾瑞兹说等他们脱身后就会去寻求支援

translation.en: TRAVIS: Cell towers must still be jammed.
translation.zh: 信号塔应该还是被干扰了

translation.en: But it shouldn't be too long now,
translation.zh: 但现在应该不会持续太久

translation.en: which means you need to disappear.
translation.zh: 也就是说你需要消失了

translation.en: I don't know if I have it in me to run anymore.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己还跑不跑得动

translation.en: I am constantly running.
That and all the people trying to kill me...
translation.zh: 还有那么多人想要杀了我

translation.en: It's exhausting. [CHUCKLES]
You got all that money in your head. Why not just retire?
translation.zh: 你的脑袋里装了那么多钱为什么不退休呢？

translation.en: That is blood money.
As a matter of fact...
Dude, what the fuck?
Take it.
What the hell is it?
SCORPION: It's what all the fuss is about.
translation.zh: 这一切都是为了这玩意

translation.en: A microchip.
What's in your head. That's clever.
translation.zh: 所以的确是装在你脑子里，真聪明

translation.en: And now it's better in your hands.
ELLEN: Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.zh: 昨晚有一个集装箱从波哥大运抵墨菲

translation.en: Yeah, what'd he turn out to be? A guy in a box.
translation.zh: 结果变成了什么？集装箱里的一个人

translation.en: ELLEN: The least he could've done was given us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.zh: 他至少可以把芯片交出来让我们保住性命

translation.en: TRAVIS: There's no microchip.
Ellen, what are you doing? It's nothing personal, Travis.
translation.zh: -艾伦，你在做什么？-这不是针对你，特维斯

translation.en: ELLEN: You should have just handed Scorpion over, Travis.
translation.zh: 你应该把蝎子交出去，特维斯

translation.en: No one was supposed to get hurt. You should've just let it go.
translation.zh: 不会有人受伤，而你就是不肯放手

translation.en: Don't.
Don't.
It's over.
MAN: What did I say?
Good? Yeah.
SOPHIA: FBI was onto her.
And she knew.
I never liked her.
What is that?
A souvenir.
MAN: Excuse me, Commander.
Can I ask you to come and identify the body?
translation.zh: 我能请你来识别一下尸体吗？

translation.en: MAN: Is this the man known as Scorpion?
translation.zh: 这就是那个叫蝎子的人吗？

translation.en: That's-- That's him.
MAN: Okay. Take him away, guys.
Is there something you wanna tell me?
translation.zh: 有什么你想告诉我的吗？

translation.en: TRAVIS: Yeah, but for your protection, I'd better not.
translation.zh: 对，为了保护你，还是别说了吧

translation.en: The less you know...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hey, hon.
How's the party going? CARLEY: Travis, oh, my God.
I've been worried sick. Are you okay? TRAVIS: Yeah, I'm-- I'm fine. I'm on my way.
translation.zh: -我担心坏了，你没事吧？-是，我没事，我这就回来

translation.en: I'll tell you about it when I get up there, okay? I love you.
translation.zh: 等我回家了我再和你细说好吗？我爱你

translation.en: CARLEY: Purple. BECKY: P-U-R-P-L-E.
CARLEY: Three. BECKY: One, two, three.
Four. Four.
Hi, Daddy.
Hi, sweetheart. Oh. You look like you could use a beer.
translation.zh: -你好，亲爱的-你看起来像是要喝一杯啤酒

translation.en: Or 20.
Hey, what's this? Hey.
Yeah.
TRAVIS: This is enough.
For me.
Just you...
and her.
I don't need anything more.
But I'm pregnant.
Are you kidding me? Surprise.
TRAVIS: Is that what you were trying to tell me? Yeah.
translation.zh: -之前你是想告诉我这件事吗？-是啊

translation.en: Did you know about this?
Yeah, I could tell.
The two of you...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hall here.
MAN [ON PHONE]: Commander, we got a shitshow brewing
